And for this, you frequently apply them on their faces all the time, and they sleep with their faces covered. And only on the eyelids of their cheeks do they have wet eyebrows, which already show swelling and the apparent presence of excoriation in the ulcer; and when you press the area with your thumbs, you can feel the excoriation within those areas.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And some method of operation is in that the patient rests their head on your hand, and then cover them with a cloth. Make a compress according to the quantity it contains powder from all parts, and place it over that and press with your thumbs so that the excoriation is added at the center of the circle, and then in the middle of that wetness let the vapor incident through a crack according to its width, such that the crack is no larger than the crack made in a ventroscopy.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	More in the preceding cavity where you cut the cord completely until you reach arcernach, for in the later operations proceed with arcernach through a crack according to the form of whiteness.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Then extract those from the sheets which you have wrapped around your thumbs and revolve between your right and left hand until they are dispersed.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And make sure you do not press on the crack so that you do not damage the sphincter and loosen it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	More if your alternach does not appear at the beginning of the crack, then press a small piece of fecilitat into the crack as you proceed with alternach; then extract those as we have said; and then margin draps of linen in water and vinegar and place them over the area to strengthen those with powders.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And then anoint with salt and place it in the cavity of the crack to remove what remains of that humidity.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then cure it until it is healed.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	But if an abscess occurs in that location, then cure it by applying medicated plasters until it is healed.
Capitol .xi.	Capitol. xi.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	Methods of palpation of the whole body.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When there are natzez (swellings) in the eyelids of the eye, caused by a tight fit of the natural skin and becoming hard, then those noso (nerves) of the eye become ways of ailments such as continuous tearing and softening of the eyelids and tissue until this is the cause of destruction of the eye. This condition is called tactinir del huel, and it is cured in four ways: by cautery with fire; or by acute medicine as previously said in the Capitol of cauterization; or by incision and suturing; or by cantharides as I will say.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	And so hold the head of the patient in your left hand; then place the eyelid of the eye with your right hand. If it can be turned, good. Otherwise, insert a needle into the one where the thread is attached at the base of the eyelid, and push the needle with thread above, and let it penetrate—near the margin of the eyelid where the skin arises—and through the skin, and pull the thread up over the eyelid, then turn it back.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	And then place the skin tightly against the stream of secretion from the major lacrimal gland into the minor lacrimal gland; and remove the humors and place fine powder of coto or cloth dust on the eyelid, and cover the eyelid with a tent, as if it were the shape of a mirt leaf.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	But I must observe that the shape should be according to the amount of swelling of the eyelid, for this varies in women, for those in whom a large amount of secretion from the eyelid is required according to the degree to which the eyelid becomes softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	And then place the stream along the two lines you have marked, and start from the major lacrimal gland into the minor lacrimal gland.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if your incision near the natural skin is as thick as the king's thumb.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	And then place the needle in one of the angles of the incision, and scrape the entire area, and close the two edges with a stitch using gut or fine wool thread, and clean the wound, and adhere what remains from the threads on two sutures for some viscous causes. If you want to do this, and otherwise, leave it untreated.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	And after that, let the wound of the veins heal in three or four days, and then cure this.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	And if you wish, let the wound heal without suturing, and cure that which dries and contracts, for when the eyelid is swollen, you should apply the sealing of the wound and its incorporation; but suture is better. Therefore, so say the ancients.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	But if it is tense in the patient, and is of good operation, and not out of fear.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	And another method of healing is to figure the eyelid like a leaf of myrtle, and then elevate the eyelid by three inches separating and bringing together according to this form:
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	But if this is not possible, have the needles, and this is unequal, then take a needle on which there is thread and put that in the middle of the figure, and insert the other thread near the major lacrimal gland, and the other thread near the minor lacrimal gland, and adjust between the ties said threads equally, and then raise your hand for elevation equally, raising the entire codena over which it was marked as we have recommended.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And then adjust the two edges of the wound with a stitch, and cure that which is within until it is healed.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	If you happen to make an incision or a fissure, sew that apostema with thread and keep it clean, and apply ointment.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	And sometimes on the eyelid, its skin should be converted. Then use the incision that we have said; but stitch in a few places more artificially.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	To treat burns according to this method:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	And you should convert the eyelid and split the figure that is inside according to what I have recounted; then, by art, make two cannas or two thin astelas whose length be according to the length of the eyelid and their width a third of the width of the space.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	And you have incised at the extremities of each part where you have the threads.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	Then add a thin layer over what you have excised from the eyelid, and tighten the cannas of each part with strong tension, and leave it for some days. As the knot by the tension will die and become rejected, it will fall off as it heals itself.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	If it is delayed, then cut the threads, and immediately cure the wound while it is fresh.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	Therefore, when the swelling subsides, lift the eyelid and do not prick the skin.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	And this is the way to make two canes as follows:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	and have the quantity of length and width neither more nor less.

De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	For the elevation of pricking skin, use an awl when the skin is taut.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When the skin is unnatural, hard, rough, and pricking, in the operation for this, you should use a fine awl and place it on that fine thread. Then, carefully adjust the ends of the thread in a very delicate manner using small clamps.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	And the length of the threads should be the width of one palm.
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	And then you compose another fine thread and place it briefly, using the ends of that if you want.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	And then place the patient's head in a towel, and near the sun so that your work be declared, for it is a subtle and delicate operation.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	And then insert the needle into the edge of the cut skin, adjusting it with forceps, and make that penetrate deeply into the eyelid, while extracting that from above the natural skin.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	And then pull the skin upwards and insert it into the incision, with one or two or three pieces of skin and not more.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	And then pull your hand there so that the skin is outwardly moved with forceps in the eyelid with the natural skin.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	More if the skin is grasped with forceps and not moved outward, grasp the skin at the edges with the needle you have prepared, so that when the forceps are removed, the skin will be left behind.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And place the bandage where you can see the wound, for then you will hold the lint and dip it in the dressing, and clean every part thoroughly, leaving the wound open for two or three days until the hair adheres to its place and grows over that good flesh.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	And if the hair is shorter, then you adjust a longer piece of hair from the natural hairs, and elevate it there, or leave it until it grows to an appropriate length, and then elevate that.
Capitol .xiii.	 Chapter XIII.
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	For the cure of an elevation in the upper eyelid.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	When there is an elevation in the wound, and it is caused by a contraction of the eyelid that contracts towards the right or left side due to poor healing of a lesion or section or cautery, it is called leporine. This elevation can be either natural or accidental, and is caused by the consolidation of a lesion or sections or cauteries, or resembles them in its condition.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	May the manner of the operation be that you make that consolidation and separate the lips of it, and place in it at what is between those one leaf of cloth, and tie those together until they are healed.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And do not forget that you use the cure of it from the causes which desiccate, constrict; for if you do so return to exacerbate even more evil than there was before any time.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use for those causes that mollify thus as fenugreek, and steep it in water in which it is high and seed of it, or ointment of aloe, which be liquefied by some of the oils, and immerse that leaf in it, and cure with it.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And the treasure of your cure is that you perforate all that is not consolidated according to the form that it was at the beginning.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	And this operation which we have said, is nothing but a correction of exacerbations that do not return the form of the area as it was before.
Capitol .xiiii.	Chapter XIV.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	For the cure of ahcration which is done in the eyelid, let it be known.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This ahcration which is done in the eyelid, which is named naturally ahcration; and it can be either natural or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	More commonly, it is caused by a wound or a cut or a cautery or other similar reasons.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	For the operation, you should take a needle and make a double thread, place that needle in the flesh, and pass it from the left lacrimal to the right lacrimal so that the thread reaches the two ends of the flesh.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	Then extend the flesh at the upper parts with the needle and sew it with the needle, and incise with a broad blade.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	And therefore, if you return the shape of the eyelid as it should be, that is good; otherwise, take the ray and place it in the torn figure, and with it convert the eyelid, and make the two fissures on the edge of the eyelid.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	And if the ends of the two cracks at the angles of the incision, which you have made where they converge, and from them an angle is made such that when they are gathered together it forms a figure of them.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	And this figure is the Greek letter: lambda.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	And then close the flesh there with the amount that is the length of the sharp point left from it, which is the edge.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	And then adjust the separated parts with the thread of wool; and then cure them with what we have said about the moistening medicines and the plasters until they are healed.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	And if you incise further through a crack or suture or cautery, then you must make an incision along a flat line on the skin of the eyelid according to what has been previously described.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	And then separate with the plaster between two lips as we have said.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	In the sum of the discourse on incising when above or left over, let it flow in the operation according to how it is prepared in the form of incising, and that is in the form of diverse spots.
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled artisans at all times prepare means in every manner which is possible for him to cause the figure to return to its natural form or near it, and that malformed condition according to what suits him in the operation and the instruments in the major dispositions.
Capitol .xv.	Capitol. XV.
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	Of the adhesion of the eyelid to the conjunctiva or to the cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this consolidation occurs in men, they attempt to solidify the eyelid above on the white of the eye, and to prohibit its ease of movement and its natural actions. Therefore, you should introduce the sharp edge of a needle between the eyelid, leave the eyelid, and elevate it or extend it onto the upper lid.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	And then you incise the adhesion with a fine needle, which should not be of great sharpness, having a slightly obtuse tip so that the patient is not disturbed by the operation, and leave the fluid so that it does not affect the eye's sharpness.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	And let your incision be such that it separates the adhesion easily so that the eyelid returns to its natural form and all the adhesion is healed.
E aprop tu met en le huel aygua salada am la qual tu laves; o distilla en lu de zunia dissolvut en l’aygua.	And then place in it enough salt water to wash with; or boil it with juniper dissolved in water.
E aprop separa entre la palpebra e l’huel am calgua de li, e pausa sobre le huel lana infuza en album de huou, e aprop le tertz jorn usa de causas consolidativas entro que sia sanat.	And then separate between the eyelid and the wound with salt water, and place over the wound infused wool in honey, and for the first day use conservative treatments until it is healed.
Capitol .xvi.	Capitol. XVI.
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	On the incision of the eyelid and the prominence of the flesh of the lacrimal gland.
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	Know that the eyelid is divided into two ways: one is nervous, and it is like a thin hard thread; the other is non-nervous, resembling a white congealed moisture. When you touch it, if it must be cut, it is easily divided and no part of the cut is left in it.
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	And both species do not begin but from the major lacrimal gland where it slowly covers the eye and prohibits both light and movement.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en la inscizio de lu es que·l malaute pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop obre les huels de lu, e eleva la palpebra am la tua ma, e aprop colligeys la ungla am onci de pauca duplicacio e exten aquela a las partidas desus.	The manner of treating the incision is that the patient places his head in the supine position, then opens his eyes, raises his eyelid with your hand, and subsequently picks up the corner of the skin with an instrument and extend it to the upper parts.
E aprop pren una agula e entromet en aquela un pel de cavalh o de buou o de vaqua, o de semblantz, o de fiel fort, o duplica la extremitat de la agulha petit a petit e fica aquela en le mieg de la ungla, e penetra aquela am la agulha, e lia am fiel la ungla; e exten aquela a las partidas desus, e excorja am le pel le latz de la ungla lo qual siec la pupilla.	And then take a needle and insert either a horsehair or a bull's hair or a cow's hair, or similar hair, or a strong thread, or gradually double the tip of the needle and place it in the middle of the skin, and penetrate it with the needle, and tie the skin with thread; and extend it to the upper parts, and scrape off the hair from the skin which heals the pupil.
E ayssi tu sieguas aquela am le pel entro al derier de lu.	And then you follow that with the hair to the back of his neck.
E aprop tu inscideys le romanent en la razitz del lacrimal am spatum subtil o am petitas forfexs, e leysa la carn del lacrimal natural per so que per inscizio de aquela no endevengua fluxs de lagremas continuabla.	And then you make the incision in the groove of the lacrimal gland with a fine needle or small scissors, and leave the natural flesh of the lacrimal gland so that by this incision it does not develop continuous flow of tears.
E alscunas vetz la ungla am le sol onci estenduda o am fiel, ayssi co havem dit, e aprop sia excurjat am spatum leon del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And sometimes the thumb is placed on the sole of the extended foot or on venom, as we have said, and then it is excised with lion's tooth, which is the form of it:
E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And be careful that with the lion's tooth you do not touch the cornual membrane, and even if there is a rupture in it, and that the pupil is perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then apply a little salted honey or of vinegar made from wine, and leave it there for another day; and take care that what is applied within heals.
E si la ungla no es nervoza e no podes metre la agulha, ni es ficada en aquela le onci, lahoras motas veguadas aquesta specia de ungla es curada am medicinas, e es sanada ayssi cum yeu e recomtat en la divisio.	And if the thumb is not nerveous and you cannot put the needle in it, then treat this kind of thumb with medicines, and it is healed as I and recommended in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you want to incise it, then open the space in the thigh and take a sharp lion's tooth of heated steel according to this form:
am subtilitat.	of fine steel.
E si vezes que aquela es rarificada e es confugida e empren en aquela razit, lahoras distilla de la tua ora en le huel de cief fayt de siniar o am cief rog o am sal trissat, e opila le huel entro a l’autre dia.	And if you see that it is rarified and confined within the ulcer, then distill from your mouth into the wound of flesh made of syrian or hemp wool or salted silk, and apply the other end to this one.
E aprop itera sobre aquela la operacio entro que sia remaugut tot aquo que es de lu, sino que·l contrari apostema caut sia en le huel, quar lahoras tu leyssa aquela, e cura al comensament la apostema entro que sia sanat.	And then perform the operation on it until all of it is removed, but if a counter-pustule forms in the wound, then leave that and treat the beginning of the pustule until it is healed.
E aprop itera la tua operacio sobre aquela am razo entro que sia sanat.	And then continue your operation on it until it is healed.
La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The eminence of the tear flesh, if noticed in the wound by great damage, suspend it with a needle; and incise that part, but do not complete the incision so that you do not cut off the flow of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	And then distill into the tear duct wool or syrian wool until it is healed.

De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	Of the incision of algazardenic and of that which has arisen from flesh joined in the whole.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	In the heels of some, there arises fleshly growths that are covered over, situated near or strengthened against the eyelids and lightly binds the eyelids to the parts outside, being assembled close to the cheek.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	More importantly in this operation is that the patient places their head on a pillow; and then open the heels of that person and collect all that flesh with convenient incisions, using forceps or tongs; and then cut the flesh at the beginning before everything is finished with the scalpel, and keep watch over the wound to ensure you do not lose track of it for your operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And your incision should be made in the manner we have described in the incision of the thumb, or with small scissors using which the flesh is collected according to the form that will come in this chapter.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Then, once your incision is completed and the entire flesh is reddened, fill the wound with salted salve, or sprinkle it with a powder of rogar similar to that of corrosive medicines, and place a wax pledget over the wound outside until an abscess is assured.

And if there arises any cause for guardency and is seared with caut, and fears apostema caut, then leave the whole and cure that apostema by what yields that apostema, and then iterate over that with operation between that be healed, and similarly do in the flesh adjusted which you encounter in the healing of this kind.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	Moreover, however, you must know that you should allow all healing of the wound by natural means or by accidental means, prepare with iron, and do not put your hand in any of these operations until you see that this member is suffering from this operation.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter XVIII.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	On the collection of knowledge in the wound.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Surgery shows us veins that are prominent on the wound and prohibits their operation, and they expand the wound over a long period of days.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, at the beginning, you must consider whether the wound in which surgery is to be performed is strong and if there is no other illness in it. Then, you collect that knowledge.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And you command the patient to place his head in your lap, and then suspend those veins at one or two inches according to your discretion; and let that inch be of subtle doubling according to this form:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	and the two inches gradually in one piece according to this form:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	And then gather those veins with fine threads, with subtlety, and cleanse the wound hour by hour, while urging those veins to remain open and be rotated.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And be sure that you do not let the blood reach the extremities of the spatum; and if your operation in the middle of the day before the sun, be firm in your operation that you enter only those veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you have completed, then distill in the wound vinegar or rancid oil to make what is open from the scab acrid.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut. E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	This is the form of the forks:

De reduccio de arizati al nas.	For the reduction of hernias to the nose.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you treat hernias with a cautery or with sharp burning medicine, according to whether the narration of its history precedes and it is not cured, then do not perform any operation on it. E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And when the bone is revealed and corruption or blackness appears within it, then treat it with an instrument of which this is the form:

Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat. Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	Let the end of the iron be triangular, and the shaft be narrowed towards the end in this manner as you see.

And place it over the bone, and let that be close to the lacrimal; then extend your hand a little along its length, and return your hand with the strips so that they penetrate the entire bone, and that feels the patient's pain through the air that passes by when you move your hand.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Then restore the area with medicinal powders drying as they are accustomed.

Capitol .xx.	Capitol.xx.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	For the reduction of the prominence of the heel.

E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	And the method of powders is that you take cloths soaked in oil of lions, and each cloth be folded into four parts; then use those folds.

Capitol .xxi.	Chapter XXI.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	On the incision of the prominence of the uveal membrane.

When there is disruption in the uveal membrane, and then this prominence protrudes and proceeds outward like a degree of swelling, and its shape resembles that of a person. If you wish to incise it, the operation on it is as we have recommended. You should insert the needle into the margin of the uveal membrane from one side to the other, just above where you left off. Then place another needle at the lacrimal part with a double thread, and allow the latter to penetrate while leaving the first needle in its position. Next, incise the area of the double thread and lift the part of the uveal membrane in the circuit of the needle, then strengthen it.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	And then extract the needle and place yourself over the wound filled with honey album and let the thread be in it until it dissolves.

And sometimes gather all the parts in a circle of cloth under the wound, and then let a fine needle be perforated through the cloth to the bottom of the wound, allowing the humidity albuminosa to drain and descend, and exit soon.

Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22.
De curacio de alconati.	On the cure of ulcers.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This illness called ulcers is nothing but putrefaction which settles in the wound resembling running water and is not the other.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	The method of treating it is to place the ulcer on a clean, straight surface, and then hold its edges with your fingers in two parts, and move those parts where you see the putrefaction reach the parts left, and then dry it so that it does not descend, and keep the light, allowing the ulcer to see the causes as one sees.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it does not come down below, know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	And if the descent to the wound is not prepared as we have said, then make the patient lie on their back and proceed with suctioning a fine tube over the conjunctiva onto the cornea into the place vacant, so that the water is expelled.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	And since the water is expelled, then you administer the distilled water into which you have mixed honey or water in which you have already boiled fenugreek and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And then cure the other causes once it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Capitol.xxii.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	On the cure for water descending into the wound.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	We have already mentioned the species of water in the division and which one is to be used for perforation as we declared, according to its nature.

And then place your hand in the location where there is water, and then you lower it down one time or another. And when it is drawn out and does not descend, then you withdraw your hand with ease, and slowly rotate your hand around, and then dissolve a little of clear gemstone salt in the water and with that wash inside; then place outside the solution a clot or stop or infused wool in olive oil and egg white and tie this with it the solution inside.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	More importantly, those of our times tie it with olive oil.

And you should allow the patient a comfortable recovery in a bed made for him, on his back in a dark house, and all movements should be prohibited.
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	And place the patient in their natural position so that their nature is corrected, and do not tilt their head to the right or left side too much.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	And apply the ointment according to its disposition on the third day.

And then remove the patient from that dark room and expose them to fresh air, and make them walk for some causes, and then return the ointment on the seventh day.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	And do not perform this at the time of curations or very close to the infusion.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	Having a cavity that you open through which water may pass more easily by great and violent regard.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	But if an abscess occurs, having a cavity that you incise on the seventh day, and corrects that amount which yields the abscess.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa. E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	And gradually let it recover and return to its original state.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And know that in an apprentice's case vision is not excused for some days, and then you should watch over the operation.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	And we have been informed of some who have already recovered from those cases, which are called Artach, and some said to make fire on the Ayrac magnam perforated with which water is discharged.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	But I have not seen such a case in our land where it was performed perfectly, nor is it mentioned in any of the ancient books; and it is possible that this is a new method.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	And these are the forms of the species of maagdhaan so that it may be upon those who ignore them:

And they are made of iron or brass properly, and their extremities from them to this subtlety triangular, the acute end thus as that is the form.
Capitol .xxiv.	Capitol.xxiv.
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	For the healing of flesh in the nose.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When in the nose there arise various hidden flesh masses, from which arises some cause that is associated with the scorpion of heavy burdens, or with a polyp of this kind; and this illness is called polypus, which is in resemblance to that kind of burden represented.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And of it is cancerous flesh, dark in color; and from it is that flesh lion-like not of dark color.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	Therefore, in that which is in these lion-like flesh not fraudulent nor cancerous, make the illness disappear between your hands and place it in the sun, and inhale its smell, and prick the thigh in those flesh.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	And then extract it from the parts forward, and then divide what you have grasped with a sharp thin knife between which you know all the flesh has been separated; if some remains due to any cause for which the sectioning is possible, then quickly use one of the sharp instruments to facilitate its separation for any reason.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.	If it festers or an evil abscess occurs, then pause at that which is covered; or if it is from malignant abscesses, then incise and cauterize there where the sectioning must be done and all the cavities should be exposed.
E aprop sia getatz en le nas aprop la inscizio vi agre e aygua o vi.	And then insert something in the nose after the incision, either a piece of cloth or wool.
Mays si le nas es ubert e de lu procezeys humiditat entro al palat, lahoras sapias que ja es sanat.	And if the nose is already opened and moisture proceeds to the palate, then you know that it is already healed.
Mays si la humiditat no penetra segon que cove, lahoras tu sapias que dedintz lu es carn nada en los pus sobiras osses de las nars als quals non es pervengut abscizio.	And if the moisture does not penetrate as expected, then you know that inside there is no flesh but only pus, and it will be bones of the nose to which incision has not reached.
Donc lahoras cove que entromitas fiel de li al qual sia alcuna grosseza, e nuza en lu motz nuzes, e pausa entre quascun nutz la quantitat del dit o mens, e engene le malaute e entromet una extremitat del fiel en le nars am lo ray o am autra causa la qual es a lu possibla.	When you find an obstruction in the vein of which there is any lump, use needles on it and place between each needle the size of a finger or less, and probe the malady and insert one end of the thread into the naris along the ray or for another cause which is possible to him.
E pus que aquo aura fayt, que atire le sieu odorament entro que pervengua a las canals de las nars, e sia eyssit sobre le sieu golayro, quar tropas veguadas le semblant ad aquesta accio fan les enfantz a las scolas, e es leugiera causa ad aquel que ho vol far.	And when this has been done, let it emit its odor into the nostrils' canals until it reaches the brain, and sit over his pillow, for tropic views of this action make children at schools laugh, and it is a light cause for those who wish to do so.
E aprop pausa las dos extramitatz del fiel, una extremitat que iesca sobre le nas et l’autra que romangua en le nas, e aprop aministra serratura de carn am les nuzes que so en le fiel, e fay aquo entro que sapias que las carn ja so am les nuzes del fiel.	Then return the two ends of the thread, one that itches near the nose and the other that tingles in the nose, and then administer a stitch of flesh around the needles that are in the thread, and do this before you know that the flesh has reached the needles of the thread.
E aprop extratz le fiel, e pausa en le nas aprop la abstraccio del sanc una calgua , e fay aquo per tres dias o mays entro que l’enguent corrodo tot aquo que es romas de las carns.	Then extract the thread, and place a blister near the opening of the vein with a blistering herb, and do this for three days or more until the salve corrodes all that is necrotic from the flesh.
E aprop en la fi de la causa, pausa en le nas una canula de plom per alscus jorns entro que sia sanat.	And at the end of the cause, place in the nose a lead cannula for several days until it is healed.
Mays si endigeys de curacio que exsique, usa de aquela.	If you desire a cure that is dry, use of that.
E aquesta es la forma del instrument a capipurge fazedor am le qual son distillatz olis e medicinas en le nars:	And this is the form of the instrument for making purgatives, at which are distilled oils and medicines in the nose:
E fay aquo de argent o de eram, la qual sia semblant a una petita lampesa uberta, ayssi cum petita conqua, e le meat semblantment.	And make it of silver or copper, which is similar to a small open lamp, like a small basin, and the mouth similar.
E si vols, fay una canula clausa ayssi cum cana, e la cancula del estrument a capipurge fazedor e sia plana, descuberta; a la qual sia manubre en lo derier de lu, am le qual tenguas aquela quan escaufas en lu oli o aquo que tu vols dels sucs e de las causas suctiblas.	And if you want, make a closed cannula like a reed, and the mouth of the instrument for making purgatives flat and open; to which you can insert it at the rear end, with which you will have it when you heat in it oil or what you want from the secretions and causible substances.
E aquestz capipurgi es precios: recipe de enforbi de castor, de balayra blanc, de giengiebre, e piletre de safra, de pebre lonc, de escafragia, de epetum de spic ana unc. vi cumfizeys am suc de bleda e de caul, e sian faytas pillulas, e sia destemprada una pillula am aygua tebeza, e sia gitat en las nars del malaute jasent envers.	And these purgatives are precious: take castor oil, white balsam, cinnamon, saffron, long pepper, rue, and one uncia of ginger. Mix them with wheat juice and calf's gall, make them into pills, and temper one pill with clear water, then give it to the patient through the nose facing forward.
Capitol .xxv.	Chapter XXV.
De theyls natz en las extramitatz del nas.	From the teeth to the extremities of the nose.
Motas veguadas es nat theyl en las extramitatz del nas, e es magnificat e omentat en alscus dias entro en que mot es leg le reguardament de lu.	Pores visible are seen in the teeth at the extremities of the nose, and they become enlarged and palpable within a few days as the swelling becomes apparent upon examination.
E per aquo cove que tu inscidas aquel en le comensament de la apparissio de lu, e erediques tot aquel.	And for this reason, you should examine that person at the beginning of the appearance of the swelling, and treat them entirely.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc o cauteri o medicina comburent la qual estia en loc de lu.	And place your hand over the area or the cautery or burning medicine which is at that location.
Mays si es tardada la sua inscizio entro que sia magnificat, lahoras considera si es lapificat, dur, de fusca color e de pauc sentiment, lahoras no toques aquel am ferr quar es apostema crancos; quar motas veguadas ad aquel que inscideys aquesta apostema endeve per lu granda malicia sobre aquel le qual aquel havia.	But if the examination is delayed until after it has become enlarged, consider whether it is hardened, dark in color, and with little sensation. In this case, do not touch that with a probe as it may be an abscess; for visible pores should only be examined where you have found this abscess due to its great malignity towards the person.
E si le apostema es de leon tocament e no es de fosca color, e vezes que inscizio es possibla en tot aquel, lahoras evacua le malaute e inscideys aquel senes temor, e cura le loc am aquo que exsique e costrenh entro que sia sanat.	And if the abscess is due to a blow and not dark in color, and examination is possible throughout that area, then evacuate the poison and incise there without fear, and treat the area with what dries and constricts until it is healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter 26.
De sutura del nas e de las labias e de la aurelha quan la continuitat es dissolvuda per plagua o per semblantz.	For the缝合鼻子、嘴唇和耳垂，当连续性因创伤或相似原因被破坏时。
Sapias que quan accideys solucio de continuitat en una de aquestas cartillages, pauc confereys en aquela operacio sino en alcus homes.	Know that when there is a disruption of continuity in one of these cartilages, you should not place much trust in that operation but rather in skilled individuals.
Donc cove, quan endeve ad alcu alcuna causa de aquelas, que consideres si es plagua fresca am le sieu sanc, e lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Therefore, when you need to treat any of these cases, consider whether it is fresh trauma with its own healing, and then adjust the two edges of the wound with sutures, and properly cure it until it is healed.
E si las labias de solucio de continuitat so ja separadas, e quascuna es fayta sana, lahoras cove que tu excorjes quascuna partida de la sua codena apparent entro que n’iesca sanc.	And if the edges of the disruption are already separated, and any part is made healthy, then you should excise each part from its apparent wound until it has formed a scab.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias am sutura e strenh aquelas, e sobre aquelas pulveriza sanc de drago e enses trissat, e pausa sobre la polvera una pessa de emplaustra diafinicon, o de alcu autre dels emplastres consolidatius, e leyssa aquel liat per dos jorns o per tres, e aprop deslia aquel e permuta aquel emplaustre e leyssa aquel entro que·ls fiels per si sian abscinditz, e aprop cura am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then adjust the two edges with sutures and strengthen them. Over these, sprinkle healing dragon's blood powder and apply three layers of diaphonic plaster or another consolidative plaster. Let this paste remain for two to three days, then remove it and change the plaster, leaving it until the wounds heal on their own. Properly cure it until it is healed.
Mays la manieyra de la sutura es que tu agregues la solucio de continuitat o am agulhas ayssi cum havem recomtat en la sutura del ventre, o agregua la solucio de continuitat am fiel ayssi cum a tu e fayt saber.	The manner of suturing is that you add the solution of continuity or use needles as we have recommended in the belly suture, or add the solution of continuity with thread as you are made to know.
Capitol .xxvii.	Capitol.xxvii.
De extraccio de aquela causas que veno en las doas labias en las partidas dedintz.	For the extraction of those causes that wind in the two lips in the internal parts.
Motas veguadas endeve a motz homes en las partidas dedintz de las suas labias alcus apostemas durs semblantz a gras de errs, e alscunas de lors son mendres e alcunas son majors.	Spots observed in the internal parts of their lips lead to abscesses hard and resembling fat, some are smaller and others are larger.
Donc cove que tu convertas las labias e fendas quascuna de aquelas duricias de tota part, e aprop la abscizio umpliscas le loc de sagi trissat entro que·l sanc sia restrengut, e aprop sia lavat am vi agre e sia curat le loc am aquo que es stipticitat, entro que sia sanat.	Thoroughly incise the lips and all parts of each hardness, then fill the wound with three layers of cloth to keep the wound constricted, and subsequently wash it with vinegar and treat the area with a solution that is astringent until it heals.
Capitol .xxviii.	Capitol.xxviii.
De inscizio de la carn ajustada en las gengivas.	For the incision of the flesh lodged in the gums.
Granre de veguadas nays sobre la gengiva carn ajustada la qual les antics apelero albulus, adonc cove que tu suspendas aquela am onci o que tenguas aquela am las forfecs e inscidas aquela deves la sua razit, e leyssas la sania correr o le sanc.	Great care must be taken over the gums, the flesh紧贴的牙龈，古人称之为albulus，然后你必须提起那块肉或将它固定住，使那部分可以分开并拉开，让健康的部分流出或排出。
E aprop pausa sobre le loc sagi trissat o autra polveras stipticas o excicativas.	Then place a ligature or another styptic or excitatory powder over the area.
E si aquela carn retorna, lahoras inscideys aquela segundariament, e cauterisa aquela, quar aprop le cauteri no retornara.	And if that flesh returns, then incise it again, and cauterize it, for after the cauterization it will not return.
Capitol .xxix.	Capitol.xxix.
De razo de dentz am ferr.	On the reason for teeth with cavities.
Quan en la superficia de las dentz de las partidas dedintz e de las de foro e entre las gingivas so ajustadas escorsas aspras, legas, e alcunas veguadas son de nigradas e son faytas citrinas o vertz entro que a la gingiva ve per aquo corrupcio e son faytas las dentz legas.	When on the surface of the inner and outer teeth and between the gums there are sharp, jagged edges, some of which are blackened and are caused by yellow or green substances that penetrate to the gum causing corruption, leading to blackened teeth.
E donc cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas e pausar le cap de lu en le tieu se, e ratz las dents en las quals apareysso aquelas escorsas e causas semblantz arena entro que de lor no romangua deguna causa, e aquo fay de la negror e de la citrinitat e de las autras entro que sian mondificadas.	And therefore you must make the patient open their mouth with your hand and hold the head in a basin of water, brush the teeth where these edges and similar causes appear so that no cause is broken from them, and do this for the blackness and the yellowing as well as other changes they may have undergone.
Donc si es ostat aquo que es en aquelas del comensament de la razio, bo es; e sino, lahoras tu itera la razio sobre aquelas al autra dia e al segon e al tertz entro que vengua al derier stament en aquo que tu vols.	Therefore, if what remains of the matter at the beginning of the reasoning is clear, that is good; otherwise, then you iterate the reasoning on those matters the next day and the second and the third until it reaches the final statement in what you want.
E sapias que las dentz han necessitat de motz rezoris de diversas formas e de motas figuras segon que es preparat a la tua operacio.	And know that the teeth have required mortars for various forms and figures according to how they are prepared in your operation.
E per so quar le razori am le qual la dent es raza de la partida dedintz es autre del razori am le qual es ras entre las dentz segon autras formas, e aquestas formas de razoris sian deves tu preparadas las quals veyras tantost:	And so, the razors with which the tooth is shaved from the inside part are different from those razors with which it is shaved between the teeth according to other forms. These forms of razors you should prepare, which you will often see.
Capitol .xxx.	Capitol.xxx.
D’eradicacio de dentz.	For the extraction of teeth.
Cove que tu cures la dent de la sua dolor am tot engen e tardes en tota eradicacio de lu, quar no es denguna causa que suplisqua la veguada de lu quan es eradicada, quar es sustancia sublima entro que es excusacio en la eradicacio de lu.	Cave that when you cure the tooth of its pain with great skill and take much time in the entire extraction, for no cause can replace the moment when it is extracted, for substance is refined during the process of extraction.
Mays cove quan le malaute es forsat aquela dent eradicar, que fermament deves tu sia certificat quala es la dent dolent, quar motas veguadas la dolor descep le malaute e cuga que sia en dent sana, e tu eradicas aquela e aprop la dolor no cessa entro que la dent malauta e dolent sia eradicada, quar nos ja havem vist aquo per operacio dels barbies.	When the patient is forced to open that tooth, you must be certain which tooth is painful, for many times the pain deceives the patient and shows as in a healthy tooth, and you extract that one and soon the pain ceases once the diseased and painful tooth is removed, for we have seen this through the operations of barbers.
Donc cum deves tu es sertificat qual es la dent dolent, e que o sabes be, lahoras cove que tu scarifiques en le circuit de la dent am spatum en le qual sia alcuna vertut, entro que sia dissolvut de la dent de la gingiva de tota partida, e aprop mau aquel am les tieus ditz, o am forfexs subtils al comensament petit a petit entro que aquela concucesquas.	Therefore, you must be certain which is the painful tooth, and knowing this well, when you incise along the circuit of the tooth where any virtue lies, until it dissolves from the root of the tooth within the gum, then insert those tweezers or fine scissors gradually little by little, so that the fragments are removed.
E aprop alogua en lu fortz tenalhas grans per bona loquacio o estuptura fort, e pausa le cap del malaute entre les tieus denolhs que be le tengues que no·s maugua, e aprop tratz la dent segon rectitut en manieyra que no trenques aquela, ni al malaute major dolor no dones.	And then wash it well to ensure good speech or strong fracture, and place the head of the patient between your tweezers so that they do not move, and then extract the tooth according to the right method so as not to break it, nor give the patient greater pain.
E donc si no es foro-getat, lahoras pren un de aquels instrumentz, e met aquel dejos lu de tota part am facilitat e esforsa la remocio de lu ayssi que es feyt al comensament.	And if it is not forcibly extracted, then take one of those instruments, and place it on the tooth from all sides with ease and effort to facilitate its removal, as is done at the beginning.
Mays si la dent es trauquada o corrosa, lahoras cove que tu comples de drap aquel trauc e estrenguas aquel am la extremitat de ray subtil per so que no sia trinquada en la hora de la tua constriccio sobre aquela am tenalas.	If the tooth is broken or腐蚀的，那么你应当用布包住那个地方，并在末端系上一根细线以防你在操作时将其进一步损坏。
E cove que tu obres exquesitament am scarificacio en le circuit de tota part de la gingiva e guarda mot la tua fortaleza que no trenques aquela e romangua partida de lu, e retorne sobre le malaute per la malicia que sia majo que la primieyra dolor de lu.	And you should incise meticulously in the circuit of all parts of the gum and preserve its strength so as not to break that torn part, and return over the pain because it is worse than the first pain.
E guarda te que no fassas aquo que fan alscus ignorantz barbiers en lor fistinacio e audacia sobre la eradicacio de lor, ses que no aministran aquo que nos havem recomtat; quar motas veguadas fan venir sobre les homes malautias grans las quals son pus dificils que sian trinquadas, e las razitz de lor remaugudas totas, o alcunas de aquelas, o que extrayguas aquela am alcus osses de la mandigula ayssi cum motas veguadas havem testificat.	And make sure you do not do what some ignorant barbers do in their incisions and audacity in the eradication of boils; for they do not administer what we have advised. For false impressions often bring great illnesses to men, which are harder to treat than boils, and the causes of their failures, all or some of them, or that you extract from certain bones of the mandible, as false impressions have testified.
E aprop la eradicacio de lu sia lavada la boca am vi caut o vi agre am sal.	And after the eradication of the boil, wash the mouth with warm water or wine mixed with salt.
E si endeve fluxs de sanc per aysso, ayssi cum motas veguadas endeve, lahoras trissa alcuna quantitat de zegi e aspergeys sobre la plagua, e si no confereys aquel zegi, cauteriza.	And if there are fluxes of pus for this reason, as false impressions often cause, then take some saffron and sprinkle it over the wound. If this saffron does not work, cauterize.
La forma de las forceps e tenalas subtils am las quals es mauguda la dent al comensament sia de longua extramitat, de breu manubre e gros, per so que no sian doblatz quan am aquels deves obrar.	The shape of the forceps and the fine tongs used to grasp the tooth at the beginning of its emergence is long and thin with some thickness, so that they do not bend when those you use them.
E sian ayssi cum vezes de gros manubre entro que quan estrenhas am aquelas no sian dobladas, sian breus extramitatz.	And they should be thus wide enough to prevent them from bending when you make them narrower.
E sian faytas de ferr de India descentment faytas de dreytas extramitatz, e en las extramitatz de aquelas sian dentz de las quals las unas intron en las autras e estrenhan per constriccio descent fort, e alscunas veguadas las extramitatz de aquelas sian la forma del bec d’un auzel le qual ha nom ciconia, so es guanta, e son de fort constriccio.	And they should be made of Indian iron, straight and long. At the ends of these, there should be teeth that interlock with each other and are firmly fixed by a strong construction. Sometimes, the ends of these should have the shape of a bird's bill which is called a ciconia, and they are well-made.
Capitol .xxxi.	Capitol.xxxxi.
De erradicacio de dentz e d‘estraccio dels osses de las mandibulas trincadas.	For the removal of teeth and extraction of broken jaw bones.
Quan deves la eradicacio de dent le qual es trinquat roman alcuna causa, lahoras cove que tu pauses sobre le loc coto am boder per un jorn o per dos entro que·l loc sia mollificat; e aprop entromet algesti o tenalhas las extramitatz de las quals so asembladas al bec de un auzel apelat ciconia o guanta, la forma de las forceps:	When you need to remove a tooth that is broken due to some cause, you should first ensure that you pause over the location carefully to allow it to heal for one or two days until the area becomes less swollen; then insert forceps or tongs with teeth resembling the bill of a ciconia or guanta, the shape of which is similar to the forceps.
Las extramitatz de lor sian faytas dedintz ayssi cum lima o alfagi.	The extremities of their pain are felt inside as if by hammer or blow.
E si no obediys a tu a eyssiment am aquestas forceps o tenalas, lahoras cove que tu caves sobre la razit e descrobas tota la carn e entrometas le instrument le qual ha nom atali, so es palanca petita del qual la forma es aquesta:	And if it does not obey to your attempt with these forceps or tenacula, then cut over the ridge and strip all the flesh away and insert the instrument which is named attalect, so it is a small lever of which the form is this:
E sia de breu extremitat grossa un petit, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	And let it be briefly an extremity with a small base, and do not bend it so that it is not twisted.
Donc si per aquo la razit es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, ajuda te am aquestz autres instrument dels quals aquestas son las formas: la forma del primier instrument es de triangulada extramitat en la qual sia alcuna grossesa:	So if by this the ridge is pierced, good; and otherwise, help yourself with these other instruments of which these are the forms: the form of the first instrument is triangular in extremity, in which there is some base:
La forma del segon instrument es que sia de triangulada e de pus subtil extremitat.	The form of the second instrument is triangular and with a finer extremity.
E ja so ajudatz am aquest instrument havent dos ramps del qual aquesta es la forma aprop la seguent:	And now help yourself with this instrument having two ramps, of which this is the form in the following:
e am autres instrumentz les quals precidero en rasura de dentz; quar juvament es fayt am aquest instrument le qual es asemblat a onci gran, e aquesta es la forma:	And with other instruments which are used for rasuring teeth; for youth is made with this instrument which resembles a large spoon, and this is the form:
de la triangulada extremitat torta o curta, la qual sia alcuna grossesa, e no sia enbegut per so que no sia trinquat.	From the triangular extremity twisted or curved, which is some kind of swelling, and not completely engorged so that it is not tense.
E otra sapias que·ls instrumentz de las dentz motz so e semblantment les autres instruments.	And another note that the tooth extraction tools resemble other instruments.
Mays le artifexs savi e subtil en l’art, atroba per si mateys segon aquo que a lu significa la operacio e las malautias diversas; quar son de las malautias a las quals les antics no diysero ni pausero propri instrument, per las formas de diversas specias.	But the skilled and subtle craftsmen find suitable tools for themselves according to what the operation signifies and the various ailments; which are the ailments to which the ancients would neither refer nor pause with a specific instrument due to their different forms.
Mays si es trinquat l’os de la mandibula o dels autres osses de la boca, o si poyreys, lahoras sia pes curat sobre aquel en son loc am aquo que es a lu convenient dels instrumentz e de las forceps las quals havem dit en la extraccio de las razitz de las dentz, e ajuda te am gesti del qual aquesta es la forma:	But if the bone of the mandible or other bones in the mouth are tense, or if you need to extract them, then place weight on that area at its location and use what is convenient from the instruments and forceps which we have mentioned in the extraction of the roots of the teeth, and the gesture of which this is the form:
E sia en lu alcuna grosseza petit a petit, e sia instringida o tenguda am la boca per que no evasesca o fuga entro que l’os de tot sia foro-getat; e aprop restaura le loc am medicinas convenientz ad aquo.	And let it be some small swelling little by little, and tightened or held in the mouth so that it does not escape or flee until the bone is completely drilled; then restore the area with appropriate medicines.
Mays si en l’os es petita poyredura, lahoras ratz aquel de aquela poyredura e de la sua negror, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	If in the bone there is a small suppuration, first drain that of the pus and its blackness, and cure it when it is healed.
Capitol .xxxii.	Chapter XXXII.
De la cura de las dentz eminentz sobre las autras.	Of the treatment of prominent teeth above the others.
Quan las dentz so eminentz no segon lor cors natural per aquelas la forma es laga, e majorment quan endeve a las femnas, e majorment a las piuselas venerablas; donc cove que tu consideras: si dent es nada aprop autra dent, e no es possibla sarradura ni linament de lu, lahoras radica aquela; mays que no sia annexa am autra dent, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am aquest instrument del qual aquesta es la forma; e es semblant a morr de porc, e sia feyt de ferr de India de extramitat mot aguda.	When the teeth are prominent not according to their natural shape and size, especially when they grow towards women, particularly venerable old women; therefore, consider this: if a tooth is close to another tooth and it is impossible to root or extract it by lineament, then extract that one. However, if it is not attached to another tooth, use an instrument with a sharply pointed tip, resembling a pig's tusk, made of Indian steel.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscideyses aquela en trops dias per la duricia de la dent, e que no sia comauguda autra de las dentz.	And let your incision be with the instrument with which you extract that tooth over several days due to its hardness, and ensure it is not too close to another tooth.
E si es dent eminent expausat a limadura, lahoras lima aquel am lima de ferr de India del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if the tooth is prominent and worn out, then file that with a file of Indian steel, which has this shape:
E sia tot de ferr de India e·l margua eysament; e sia de motz menutz puntz ayssi cum lima am la qual son faytas agulhas, am la qual la dent sia limada pauc a pauc en motz dias am fecilitat, per so que no sia autra dent comauguda e caga.	And it should be made of iron from India and the margin smoothed; and it should have small pointed points like a file, on which the tooth is filed little by little over several days for ease, so that there is not another sharp tooth to cause harm.
E aprop lineys aquela en la fi, e ratz aquela am alscus razoris.	And draw that one at the end, and cut that one with a few razors.
E si es dent del qual una partida es trinquada e lideys la lengua, lahoras cove que tu limescas aquel entro que l’aspretat de aquela fraccio sia ostada e engualhada, e sia aplenada per so que la lengua no ledesca ni la paraula no corrumpa.	And if a tooth is broken and the tongue gets in the way, then you should file that area where the sharpness of that fragment is obstructed and smoothed, so that the tongue does not get hurt and the word does not become corrupted.
Capitol .xxxiii.	Capitol.xxxiii.
De restauracio de dentz maugudas am fiel de aur o de argent.	For the restoration of rotten teeth with an auric or silver foil.
Quan accideys a las dentz devant concussio e remossio per percussio o per cazament, e le malaute no pot strenher sobre aquo que manga, e tu has curat aquel am medicinas stipticas, e no ha valgut la tua curacio, lahoras per so que no cagan es engen en aquelas que sian strengudas am fiel de aur e no de argent, quar argent se fa vert e aprop se poyreys aprop alscus dias, mays aur nul temps no es mudat.	When the front teeth are damaged by concussion or removal through impact or extraction, and the patient cannot strengthen over what remains, and you have treated it with styptic medicines, but your treatment has not been effective, then for those that can be strengthened use an auric foil and not a silver one, because silver turns green and will likely do so in a few days, whereas gold does not change at all.
E sia le fiel en tal subtilitat e grocesa segon la quantitat que puesca entrar entre las dentz; e la forma de la reccio es que prenguas le fiel e pren lo doble de lu entre doas dentz sanas, e aprop que cresques am doas tortuositatz del fiel entre doas maugudas, o si’ una o motas, entro que pervengua la tela a la dent sana del autra partida.	And let the honey be in such fineness and graininess according to the quantity that can enter between the teeth; and the form of the dose is that you take the honey and put twice its volume between two healthy teeth, and almost as many wrinkles of the honey between two molar teeth, or if one or spots, until the tissue reaches the healthy tooth on the other side.
E aprop itera le teyssiment entro a la partida de la qual comenciest, e strenh la tua ma am facilitat e savieza entro que no sia mauguda.	And then insert the thread into the part where you started, and strengthen your hand with facility and skill so that it is not molar.
E sia la tua striccio am la qual strenhas le fiel deves las razitz de las dentz que no evasesca.	And let your tightening be such that it strengthens the honey, ensuring that the roots of the teeth are not displaced.
E aprop inscindeys las extramitatz del fiel superfluens am las forceps o tosoyras, e agregua aquelas en quascun loc am gesti, e converteys aquelas e las occulta entre la dent sana e la dent mauguda, per so que no fassa lesio a la lengua.	And then divide the excess threads with the forceps or scissors, and add them to any location with your hand, and cover those and the hidden ones between the healthy tooth and the molar tooth, so as not to injure the tongue.
E aprop leyssa aquela ayssi streyta cum roman.	And then let it stay thus tight as a Roman.
Mays si es desliada o rumpuda, strenh aquela o aquelas am autra fiel en tal manieyra en tot son temps.	If it is slipped or broken, strengthen her or them in such a manner throughout its time.
E aquesta es la forma de las dentz e la figura de la rectacio de doas dentz sanas e de doas maugudas, ayssi cum vezes aquestas liadas:	This is the form of the teeth and the figure of the extraction of two healthy teeth and two molars, as you see these tied:
E quan se fa que retorno una dent o doas aprop le cazement de quascuna en lors locs, e sian recrescutz ayssi cum havem recomtat, e que remauguan.	When one returns a tooth or two to their proper places in the jaw, and they have grown back as we have described, then they should remain.
E no fa aquo sino bo artifexs e savi.	And it is not done by anything other than good artisans and wise people.
E alcunas veguadas es aptat alcuna causa dels osses de vaca, e es fayt de lor ayssi cum forma de dent, e es pausada en loc en le qual defayl la dent, e es strengit ayssi cum havem dit, e reman e serveys am aquel per lonc temps.	And sometimes it is fit for some cause of the bones of cattle, and it is made from them as the form of a tooth, and it is placed in the place where the tooth failed, and it is strengthened as we have said, and remains and serves for a long time.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Capitol.xxxiv.
De inscizio del liament le qual ve en la lengua e prohibeys loquela.	Of the incision of the ligament which is in the tongue and prohibiting speech.
Aquest liguament le qual ve dejos la lengua alcunas veguadas o es natural am le qual hom nays, o accidental e accideys per plagua la qual ja es consolidada.	This ligament which leaves the tongue in some cases is natural as one is born with it, or accidental and due to a wound which has already healed.
E la operacio en lu es que huobres la boca del malaute, le sieu cap existent en le tieu se; e eleva la sieua lengua, e aprop inscideys aquel liament nervos segon la latitut entro que sia solvuda la lengua de la sua recencio.	And the operation is that one opens the mouth of the patient, who lies on his back; elevates the tongue, and then incises that ligament nerve according to the width between which the tongue can be freed from its recession.
